name: Veronica
description: I use there keyboard with a windows PC AND AN android tablet. it doesn't have the apple function keys but it probably works like any USB keyboard. the trackball is very easy to use and effective.

name: Richard
description: Absolutely nothing wrong with these monitors they are great especially for a office environment like I needed. Highly recommend. I bought three of them as you can see by the picture. There's nothing like having three monitors.

name: Alexa
description: The sound of speaker quality is superb. The bass response is indeed superior to the 4 as well as the battery life.. This speaker far, far exceeded my expectations.  I highly recommend.
